name: MTV Music Generator 2
storyline: Prepare for sound. Prepare for music. Prepare to generate. Whether you're a superstar DJ or just starting out, MTV Music Generator™2 is all you need to create killer tunes in minutes. From the makers of MTV Music Generator™, it's music creation of PlayStation®2. It's easy. It's awesome.
